DialogueDictionary.CHERT_START_1: Hello there! Is this your first launch? Welcome to the Hourglass Twins.
DialogueDictionary.CHERT_START_2: Yes, it is. What are you doing here exactly?
DialogueDictionary.CHERT_START_3: Let's celebrate Christmas! I'm helping travelers get home for the celebration.
DialogueDictionary.CHERT_START_4: Star charts, you know. This is a great place to spot astronomical events, such as supernovae.
DialogueDictionary.CHERT_START_5: I've actually seen a couple today. They're very rare.
DialogueDictionary.CHERT_START_7: So, what can I help you with?
DialogueDictionary.CHERT_START_8: Let's celebrate Christmas! I'm helping travelers get home for the celebration.
DialogueDictionary.CHERT_START_10: What do you mean? Should I just leave my place and interrupt such important work? Absolutely not.
DialogueDictionary.CHERT_START_11: Oh, the thing is, we're in a time loop. Our sun will soon go supernova. I've seen it happen many times now. Also, I've already explored everything, so you might as well go back home.
DialogueDictionary.CHERT_START_12: Ha-ha, you're very funny! Go on, tell me what you know then.
DialogueDictionary.CHERT_START_13: The Eye of the Universe was found by species from a nearby solar system, and their cloaked ship is still here.
DialogueDictionary.CHERT_START_15: The Nomai came from another solar system too, but they were not able to find the Eye because its signal was blocked by the first species.
DialogueDictionary.CHERT_START_17: The Nomai made a time-loop machine to find the Eye by trial and error but died when ghost matter from the Interloper blanketed the solar system.
DialogueDictionary.CHERT_START_18: Wow. I was expecting you to say something like "Sure, I was joking, gotcha! " but... this...
DialogueDictionary.CHERT_START_20: It sounds unbelievable... all of it!
DialogueDictionary.CHERT_START_21: But alright, let's make a deal: I will go to Timber Hearth if you can prove everything you said.
DialogueDictionary.CHERT_START_22: Sure! I already know the exact things you're about to ask: secret information that only you could know, unknown Nomai tech, and any other kind of tech.
DialogueDictionary.CHERT_START_23: Alright! How do we do this?
DialogueDictionary.CHERT_START_24: So, if you're saying you're in a time loop, you can prove it by telling me something that only I could know.
DialogueDictionary.CHERT_START_25: You can say: "Chert, I know that only you know who the inventor of Jumbo Marshmallows is".
DialogueDictionary.CHERT_START_28: It's a big secret. Maybe one day you will know, but for now, it's the only thing I could say.
DialogueDictionary.CHERT_START_30: No, since you're saying you are Mr. "I know everything", I'm asking you to bring something new to the table.
DialogueDictionary.CHERT_START_31: I mean, any unknown Nomai technology, and don't you dare take anything from the museum!
DialogueDictionary.CHERT_START_32: What else did you say? The other species' ship is still here? Cool, bring me a piece of their tech, and we're good.
DialogueDictionary.CHERT_START_33: So, the deal is the secret phrase, some unknown Nomai tech, and something significant from another civilization's tech. Deal?
DialogueDictionary.CHERT_START_34: Deal. You better prepare to fly home!
DialogueDictionary.CHERT_START_35: Chert, I know that only you know who the inventor of Jumbo Marshmallows is.
DialogueDictionary.CHERT_START_36: Oh, that was witty. Tell me that in the next loop in case you're not lying.
DialogueDictionary.CHERT_START_38: Chert, I know that only you know who the inventor of Jumbo Marshmallows is.
DialogueDictionary.CHERT_START_41: So, I'm waiting for all the proof.
DialogueDictionary.CHERT_START_43: Here's the Nomai warp core. They used it to enable the time loop machine.
DialogueDictionary.CHERT_START_45: Take a look at this item.
DialogueDictionary.CHERT_START_46: So, I've done everything you asked for. Now will you come home and celebrate?
DialogueDictionary.CHERT_START_49: Wow. That really is the one thing that only I knew. Well, not anymore.
DialogueDictionary.CHERT_START_51: I... I'm speechless... wait, if it's enabling the time loop and I can't see any wires connecting it to anything...
DialogueDictionary.CHERT_START_52: OH NO! PUT IT BACK! NOW!
DialogueDictionary.CHERT_START_53: Oh, don't be upset Chert. I'll fix it. Calm down!
DialogueDictionary.CHERT_START_54: Uh... easy for you to say! Okay, take a deep breath... inhale... exhale...
DialogueDictionary.CHERT_START_56: What an interesting artifact! It seems like the main concept of their technology is some sort of light or flame, am I right? Good job!
DialogueDictionary.CHERT_START_57: Yes. They were all about flames and lights.
DialogueDictionary.CHERT_START_58: Okay... you won. My world-view is shattered and I don't feel like I'm doing anything important here, so... let's go celebrate Christmas!
DialogueDictionary.CHERT_START_59: Yay! Let's go, my ship is nearby.
DialogueDictionary.CHERT_START_60: Wait a sec. I need to bring my ship closer.
DialogueDictionary.CHERT_START_61: Oh no, my ship is destroyed. Sorry.
DialogueDictionary.CHERT_START_62: Oh well, it's alright. I don't really need your ship. Mine is functioning. See ya!
DialogueDictionary.CHERT_START_64: Actually... yeah. That's what I was thinking too. Nice guess!
DialogueDictionary.CHERT_START_65: So, are you serious about all this?
DialogueDictionary.CHERT_START_66: Yes! Let's get down to business.
DialogueDictionary.CHERT_TREE_1: Hey! I wanted to ask.. how do you cope with all your knowledge?
DialogueDictionary.CHERT_TREE_4: Oh, is that what those Strangers looked like?
DialogueDictionary.CHERT_TREE_6: They were a little creepy and had just two eyes!
DialogueDictionary.CHERT_TREE_7: Yeah, they were very different looking, and a little creepy.
DialogueDictionary.ERNESTO_START_2: Oh, Ernesto, you shine so bright!
DialogueDictionary.ERNESTO_START_3: We need your light to finally start!
DialogueDictionary.ESKER_SHIP_1: I don't remember the last time I was in a spaceship...
DialogueDictionary.ESKER_SHIP_2: Alright, we're here! Let's go celebrate!
DialogueDictionary.ESKER_SHIP_3: I'll let you know when we land near the Village.
DialogueDictionary.ESKER_SHIP_8: You even brought your chair? Really, Esker?
DialogueDictionary.ESKER_SHIP_9: Yes! What, you wanted me to leave it on the Attlerock?
DialogueDictionary.ESKER_SHIP_7: Yes, we're here! Let's go celebrate!
DialogueDictionary.ESKER_SHIP_6: No, but I'll tell you when we're about to land.
DialogueDictionary.ESKER_START_1: Hey-hey! So you're here to bring me home, right?
DialogueDictionary.ESKER_START_2: Wait, what? How did you know?
DialogueDictionary.ESKER_START_3: Well... I get lonely up here, so I listen in on the Village with my signalscope a lot... I just heard your conversation with Slate.
DialogueDictionary.ESKER_START_4: Oh, I see... You scare me sometimes, Esker.
DialogueDictionary.ESKER_START_5: So... what's next? Are we going home?
DialogueDictionary.ESKER_START_6: Yes! I need you to celebrate Christmas. Let's go!
DialogueDictionary.ESKER_START_7: Yes, but don't go anywhere. I need to bring my ship closer.
DialogueDictionary.ESKER_START_8: I'm sorry, Esker, but it seems like my ship isn't working anymore. My bad.
DialogueDictionary.ESKER_START_9: Hold on, I need to do something first.
DialogueDictionary.ESKER_START_11: No celebration then? Sad... We can still hang out here around my campfire, you know...
DialogueDictionary.ESKER_TREE_1: Merry Christmas! Gotta say you're good pilot.
DialogueDictionary.ESKER_TREE_2: Thanks! I know I'm pretty good at it.
DialogueDictionary.ESKER_TREE_3: Do you know anything about Jumbo?
DialogueDictionary.FELDSPAR_NOTE: Okay, I'm leaving this damned place now. I'm not sure if I'll succeed without my ship, but at least I'll try. Feldspar.
DialogueDictionary.FELDSPAR_SHIP_1.1: Wow! I assume it's the angler I followed! Not sure if it's dangerous.
DialogueDictionary.FELDSPAR_SHIP_1: Nice ship, by the way! I'll have to ask Slate to make a similar one for me. Let me know when we land near the Village, okay?
DialogueDictionary.FELDSPAR_SHIP_4: Yay! Thanks for the ride. Let's go celebrate!
DialogueDictionary.FELDSPAR_SHIP_6: Nope, not yet. I'll let you know when we're there.
DialogueDictionary.FELDSPAR_START_1: Hey bud! I'm glad you found me. Can you help me escape from this cursed place?
DialogueDictionary.FELDSPAR_START_2: Why did you leave the anglerfish skeleton? It was safe there!
DialogueDictionary.FELDSPAR_START_4: Don't go anywhere, I'll bring the ship closer.
DialogueDictionary.FELDSPAR_START_5: I'm so sorry... but the ship is not functioning... we're stuck here.
DialogueDictionary.FELDSPAR_START_6: It was boring there. I saw a little anglerfish and thought it could help me fly away from Dark Bramble, so I followed it and... but then I ended up here...
DialogueDictionary.FELDSPAR_START_7: Pure luck! I was so scared that I wasn't able to move, but it seems like I was so still and quiet that the anglerfish could not see me. Ha-ha! Another mystery solved!
DialogueDictionary.FELDSPAR_START_8: Wow, yeah that really is pure luck!
DialogueDictionary.FELDSPAR_START_9: So... can you get us out of here?
DialogueDictionary.FELDSPAR_START_11: Oh boy... what are we gonna do now?
DialogueDictionary.FELDSPAR_TREE_1: Merry Christmas! I have to admit, I really missed the Village.
DialogueDictionary.FELDSPAR_TREE_4: Yeah, me too. Being the greatest space adventurer can wait sometimes, you know?
DialogueDictionary.FELDSPAR_TREE_5: Who's that? That guy looks EXACTLY like you.
DialogueDictionary.FELDSPAR_TREE_6: Well, they are literally me. From the past.
DialogueDictionary.FELDSPAR_TREE_10: Really? I never knew that. Hm.
DialogueDictionary.GABBRO_START_1: Hey, it's you! Congrats on your first launch.
DialogueDictionary.GABBRO_START_2: I don't know why, but I keep dying repeatedly. That sounds weird, huh?
DialogueDictionary.GABBRO_START_3: Yes, we already had this conversation.
DialogueDictionary.GABBRO_START_4: Yeah, me too. We're in a time loop. Only you and me are aware of it.
DialogueDictionary.GABBRO_START_5: Oh, yes, I remember. So... something went wrong, right?
DialogueDictionary.GABBRO_START_7: Ummm... makes sense. Hornfels didn't believe me when I told them I keep dying.
DialogueDictionary.GABBRO_START_8: You seem comfortable here. By the way, we're celebrating Christmas in the Village. Do you want to join?
DialogueDictionary.GABBRO_START_9: M-m-m... I don't know. I feel bored here, to be honest.
DialogueDictionary.GABBRO_START_10: All this depressing rain, you know?
DialogueDictionary.GABBRO_START_11: But on the other hand... I'm also too bored to fly anywhere or get in your ship.
DialogueDictionary.GABBRO_START_12: Here's an idea, just blow up your ship so we can both die and initiate a new loop! The excitement of it will snap me out of this funk, and I'll be back in my ship when it starts and I can fly home to Timber Hearth.
DialogueDictionary.GABBRO_START_13: I never realized you were such a lazy person before. And so morbid, too.
DialogueDictionary.GABBRO_START_14.1: By the way, remember the new exhibit at the observatory? There is a secret associated with it. But I will tell about it only on Timber Hearth.
DialogueDictionary.GABBRO_START_15: So... I'm waiting for ship explosion! Hurry up and kill me already so we can start a new loop.
DialogueDictionary.GABBRO_START_16: Um. The thing is... my ship is already destroyed.
DialogueDictionary.GABBRO_START_18: No luck then. Try not to screw this up next loop!
DialogueDictionary.GABBRO_TREE_1: Hey! That was a really huge explosion! Are you alright?
DialogueDictionary.GABBRO_TREE_3: Meh. I could have just brought you here without dying.
DialogueDictionary.GABBRO_TREE_4: Good! I already miss my hammock.
DialogueDictionary.GABBRO_TREE_6: Don't you have a strange feeling about this place?
DialogueDictionary.GABBRO_TREE_8: You feel that too? Seems like the time loop is shifting for everyone near the tree... Maybe it's because of all the Nomai wires we used to light it up.
DialogueDictionary.GABBRO_TREE_9: At least, that's just my guess.
DialogueDictionary.GABBRO_TREE_11: Don't be a snob, it was fun at least!
DialogueDictionary.GABBRO_TREE_13: Yes! Almost forgot about it. Our sattelite have detected an object covering our sun in a certain angle.
DialogueDictionary.GABBRO_TREE_14: One day I flew there and found the unknown stranger ship! But, to be honest, it's a bit scary, so I never enter it.
DialogueDictionary.GABBRO_TREE_15: If you want, I can send you a coordinates of it, if you want to visit it someday
DialogueDictionary.GABBRO_TREE_18: Okay, I understand, it's too scary! Just let me know if you ever need them.
DialogueDictionary.GABBRO_TREE_19: Alright, check your ship logs. It should appear.
DialogueDictionary.GABBRO_TREE_20: I changed my mind. Please share strange ship coordinates...
DialogueDictionary.HAL_START_1: Hey! Are you feeling nervous about your first launch? I know that feeling! I'm nervous about it too!
DialogueDictionary.HAL_START_2: You'll be the first astronaut with a Nomai translator. I'm so excited about this!
DialogueDictionary.HAL_START_3: Hal, can you write down a message in Nomai for me?
DialogueDictionary.HAL_START_4: I think I'm good, Hal. I gotta go.
DialogueDictionary.HAL_START_5: What are you doing with this rock?
DialogueDictionary.HAL_START_6: That's what I'm talking about! Good luck in space!
DialogueDictionary.HAL_START_7: I'm just practicing my Nomai writing. I learned a lot about their language when making the Nomai translator, so I thought I should be able to write in their language.
DialogueDictionary.HAL_START_8: I actually don't know what their language is called. Whatever... no one else can read it anyway.
DialogueDictionary.HAL_START_10: Sure! As you can see, I'm already practicing. So, this must be for testing the translator, right?
DialogueDictionary.HAL_START_11: Of course. Please write: "Dear Solanum, I'm inviting you to the Village to celebrate Christmas!"
DialogueDictionary.HAL_START_12: That's... uh... oddly specific. Are we celebrating something? Ah, actually nevermind.
DialogueDictionary.HAL_START_13: Let's see if I can do this...
DialogueDictionary.HAL_FINAL_1: Whoa, I see now what you meant about celebrating!
DialogueDictionary.HAL_FINAL_2: Sure, and see what I did with your rock! I used it to invite a living Nomai!
DialogueDictionary.HAL_FINAL_4: UNBELIEVABLE! Wait, stop, maybe it's an illusion? Some sort of hologram technology?
DialogueDictionary.HAL_FINAL_5: Or am I just dreaming? It's too good to be true!
DialogueDictionary.HAL_FINAL_6: What do we do next? Maybe ask Hornfels?
DialogueDictionary.HAL_ROCK_2: I know the grammar isn't perfect, but who knows... I might very well be the last living person who knows this language!
DialogueDictionary.HAL_ROCK_4: So, what are you going to do with that rock? I'm very curious.
DialogueDictionary.HAL_ROCK_5: Hmm, maybe I'll show it to a living Nomai.
DialogueDictionary.HAL_ROCK_8: Sorry, I can't talk with you right now.
DialogueDictionary.HAL_ROCK_9: Your joke was just too good!
DialogueDictionary.HORNFELS_FINAL_1: What a beautiful tree! And everyone is here!
DialogueDictionary.HORNFELS_FINAL_2: Thank you for such a surprise, thank you a lot.
DialogueDictionary.HORNFELS_FINAL_3: I'm glad all our friends are here.
DialogueDictionary.HORNFELS_FINAL_5: Yes, I don't remember the last time we had such a gathering. All together.
DialogueDictionary.HORNFELS_FINAL_7: The lights are very nice, but I think we are missing a final detail to top it off.
DialogueDictionary.HORNFELS_FINAL_8: We need something bright and shiny to put right on the top of the tree!
DialogueDictionary.HORNFELS_FINAL_9: Can you bring something like that from the observatory?
DialogueDictionary.HORNFELS_FINAL_11: We need something bright and shiny to put in on the top of the tree. See if you can find something like that up in the observatory.
DialogueDictionary.HORNFELS_FINAL_15: There should be something in the observatory.
DialogueDictionary.HORNFELS_FINAL_18: Yes, take a look at the top!
DialogueDictionary.HORNFELS_FINAL_21: Woah! That's exactly what we needed.
DialogueDictionary.HORNFELS_FINAL_22: So, are we ready to celebrate?
DialogueDictionary.HORNFELS_FINAL_24: Not yet. Please, give me a minute.
DialogueDictionary.HORNFELS_FINAL_26: Thank you for everything you've done, friend.
DialogueDictionary.MARL_START_1: Hey! You see that tree? That's my work. Impressive, eh?
DialogueDictionary.MARL_START_2: Yes, the tree is very impressive.
DialogueDictionary.MARL_START_3: That's what I'm talking about! Good luck in space!
DialogueDictionary.MARL_START_4: Good luck on your flight. We're all waiting for your mission to be completed.
DialogueDictionary.MARL_START_5: Marl, Tektite is asking for your help. There's a bramble seed on Timber Hearth and it's gro...
DialogueDictionary.MARL_START_7: We need to cut down this bush as soon as possible! I'm going to Tektite!
DialogueDictionary.MARL_FINAL_1: No way! Everyone is here, whoa. Thank you for bringing them back!
DialogueDictionary.MARL_FINAL_3: I can imagine. Let's ask Hornfels what we're doing next.
DialogueDictionary.MARL_FINAL_4: As I said, you better ask Hornfels.
DialogueDictionary.NPC_PLAYER_SHIP_1: Let me see you fly. Are you a better pilot than me or not?
DialogueDictionary.NPC_PLAYER_SHIP_3: We'll go home soon. Just wait a bit.
DialogueDictionary.NPC_PLAYER_SHIP_5: So, are you the better one at driving?
DialogueDictionary.NPC_PLAYER_START_7: I have the same memories as you, except for this loop, you know. We're literally the same person.
DialogueDictionary.NPC_PLAYER_START_8: I just had an idea. It's crazy but .. why not?
DialogueDictionary.NPC_PLAYER_START_9: ...Okay.. I guess.. are we going home?
DialogueDictionary.NPC_PLAYER_START_10: Let's get into the ship then.
DialogueDictionary.NPC_PLAYER_START_11: Just don't go anywhere, I have to bring our ship closer.
DialogueDictionary.NPC_PLAYER_START_12: I'm so sorry... but our ship is not functioning... Unfortunately, I can't take you home.
DialogueDictionary.NPC_PLAYER_START_13: I'll be right back, my ship is too far.
DialogueDictionary.NPC_PLAYER_START_15: Cool, I'll wait for you in my...
DialogueDictionary.NPC_PLAYER_START_17: I was wondering which version of us was better...
DialogueDictionary.NPC_PLAYER_START_18: Now I know! I'm definitely a better pilot than you!
DialogueDictionary.NPC_PLAYER_TREE_2: Yes, and to me as well!
DialogueDictionary.NPC_PLAYER_TREE_5: Aren't you worried about all this time travel stuff?
DialogueDictionary.NPC_PLAYER_TREE_7: Well, for one there's the thing about everyone seeing us both at the same time... Bit of a time paradox or something...
DialogueDictionary.NPC_PLAYER_TREE_8: I'm sure it'll be fine. What's the worst that could happen? It's not like anything is going to explode!
DialogueDictionary.NPC_PLAYER_TREE_9: Fair, that's exactly what I would have said too.
DialogueDictionary.NPC_PLAYER_TREE_10: You could also say one of us is just someone in a very good costume. No time travel there!
DialogueDictionary.NPC_PLAYER_TREE_11: That's just what I was thinking.
DialogueDictionary.PORPHY_TREE_2: How are you feeling before your big launch?
DialogueDictionary.PORPHY_TREE_4: What's up with this barrel in the center of the Village?
DialogueDictionary.PORPHY_TREE_5: Are you happy about all the snow?
DialogueDictionary.PORPHY_TREE_6: Well, personally I prefered the previous climate.
DialogueDictionary.PORPHY_TREE_7: But honestly this temperature is much better for storing all my barrels of sap-wine!
DialogueDictionary.PORPHY_TREE_8: Okay, got it. I gotta go.
DialogueDictionary.PORPHY_TREE_9: Glad to hear it! You know how important our space program is. We all believe in you! Hornfels especially.
DialogueDictionary.PORPHY_TREE_10: Sure! By the way, what's up with this barrel in the center of the Village?
DialogueDictionary.PORPHY_TREE_11: Oh, yes, that's the biggest barrel I have in my collection. You like it?
DialogueDictionary.PORPHY_TREE_12: The geyser in the center of the Village has been inactive recently so we had to block off the hole for safety reasons. Maybe the wine in the barrel will end up having a different taste now?
DialogueDictionary.PORPHY_TREE_13: Anyway, I feel like with this tree and all the lights it was totally worth it.
DialogueDictionary.PORPHY_TREE_19: What I can help you with?
DialogueDictionary.PORPHY_TREE_21: Are you happy about all the snow?
DialogueDictionary.PORPHY_TREE_22: Remind me, what's up with this barrel in the center of the Village?
DialogueDictionary.RIEBECK_SHIP_1: I like your ship! It's very cozy. Please let me know when we will land near the village.
DialogueDictionary.RIEBECK_SHIP_3: I'll let you know. Keep playing, Riebeck!
DialogueDictionary.RIEBECK_SHIP_5: So where are we? Maybe we should land closer to our village?
DialogueDictionary.RIEBECK_START_1: Oh, hello! Are you here to help me out?
DialogueDictionary.RIEBECK_START_2: Just... how? I mean... how did you end up here?
DialogueDictionary.RIEBECK_START_3: Yep, my ship should be nearby. Let's get in.
DialogueDictionary.RIEBECK_START_4: Hold on, I'll bring my ship a little closer.
DialogueDictionary.RIEBECK_START_5: I'm so sorry... but my ship is not functioning now... Unfortunately I can't help.
DialogueDictionary.RIEBECK_START_6: Well, I'd like to see how you'd react if a piece of the planet broke off and fell right behind you!
DialogueDictionary.RIEBECK_START_7: I had barely any time to react, so I took all the gravity crystals I had and I found a safe new place. Logically, from this side, I won't ever fall DOWN.
DialogueDictionary.RIEBECK_START_9: I get you, Riebeck. Glad to see you're alive and... safe. Kind of.
DialogueDictionary.RIEBECK_START_10: So... can you help me then?
DialogueDictionary.RIEBECK_START_11: Of course! Just be careful here.
DialogueDictionary.RIEBECK_START_12: Oh, that's really bad... I guess I'll just stay here for a while then...
DialogueDictionary.RIEBECK_TREE_3: Wow, I really like the decorations on this tree... and the barrel.
DialogueDictionary.RIEBECK_TREE_4: WAIT, IS THAT A REAL NOMAI??
DialogueDictionary.RIEBECK_TREE_5: Yes, her name is Solanum. I met her on the Quantum Moon.
DialogueDictionary.RIEBECK_TREE_6: Ha-ha! It's just somebody in a costume, right? The Nomai are all extinct, remember?
DialogueDictionary.RIEBECK_TREE_7: WOAH! A fantastic living Nomai from the Quantum Moon! COOL!
DialogueDictionary.RIEBECK_TREE_8: This is a really good costume, I would say! But yeah, you're right...
DialogueDictionary.SLATE_START_3: Yes, I'm ready for my first voyage.
DialogueDictionary.SLATE_START_4: Could you repeat what the plan is?
DialogueDictionary.SLATE_START_5: Please, remind me about the new scout upgrade.
DialogueDictionary.SLATE_START_5.1: Sure! You now have a little Nomai gravity crystal on it. You can launch it anywhere to create an artificial gravity field. Just.. don't launch it inside your ship - it's not safe.
DialogueDictionary.SLATE_START_6: Alright, you'll need to get the launch codes from Hornfels at the observatory! But first, as you can see winter has come to our Village, which means we're going to celebrate Christmas!
DialogueDictionary.SLATE_START_7: We had to block off some inactive geysers to make space for a beautiful tree and the rest of our celebration plan. We even found some Nomai wires lying around to light it up with!
DialogueDictionary.SLATE_START_9: Hopefully not all the geysers on Timber Hearth are inactive, are they?
DialogueDictionary.SLATE_START_10: Yes, some of them are still active. It's snowing a bit. Marl chopped down this beautiful tree, and I made the lights, but...
DialogueDictionary.SLATE_START_11: ...sometimes the blue ones shine too bright, like they're being overloaded with some sort of energy. Weird.
DialogueDictionary.SLATE_START_12: Anyway, it seems like everyone is happy with winter! You should go talk to the villagers before liftoff.
DialogueDictionary.SLATE_START_13: Sure. I can't wait to begin my space adventure!
DialogueDictionary.SLATE_START_15: Umm, I'm not sure. You can ask Porphy about it.
DialogueDictionary.SLATE_START_17: Regarding the celebration, we need to bring all the travelers back home. I asked Esker a few times to help, but they keep forgetting. It's as if I had never even spoken to them!
DialogueDictionary.SLATE_START_18: Since it's your launch day and there are no other pilots here, it will be your mission to bring them all back. You can start with Esker, since they're so close by.
DialogueDictionary.SLATE_START_19: We want this to be a surprise for Hornfels and Hal, since they're always so busy working in the observatory, so please don't tell them anything. Let me know when everyone is here so we can start the celebration.
DialogueDictionary.SLATE_START_20: Great plan! I can't wait to bring them all back home.
DialogueDictionary.SLATE_START_21: You need to find all the travelers, tell them about the celebration, and bring them back here.
DialogueDictionary.SLATE_START_22: Hornfels should be kept in the dark about the plan until everyone is ready. It's a surprise!
DialogueDictionary.SLATE_START_25: Yes! It's too quiet around here. We need their music, or else no Christmas magic will ever happen. So...
DialogueDictionary.SLATE_START_26: Do you have any other questions?
DialogueDictionary.SLATE_START_28: Nope, everyhing is clear to me.
DialogueDictionary.SLATE_START_31: Good. I'll be here if you need me.
DialogueDictionary.SLATE_START_33: Yeah, I've been upgrading our scouts. If you try yours out, you'll notice it has a little Nomai gravity crystal on it! You can launch it at walls and literally stand horizontally. It's neat, you should give it a try.
DialogueDictionary.SLATE_START_35: Just be careful using it in places where you're not supposed to be standing. That just makes it even more dangerous to fall, so keep that in mind.
DialogueDictionary.SLATE_START_35.1: I also strongly recommend you don't launch it inside your ship. There's already a gravity crystal in there, I really don't think it's safe to mix artificial gravity fields like that.
DialogueDictionary.SLATE_START_36: Good point. I'd hate to blow up my ship!
DialogueDictionary.SLATE_START_37: Great job, hatchling! I'm glad all our friends are here and the music is playing.
DialogueDictionary.SLATE_START_38: Are we ready to tell Hornfels and Hal? Or do you want to invite anyone else?
DialogueDictionary.SLATE_START_39: Actually, I need more time to invite someone else.
DialogueDictionary.SLATE_START_41: Just kidding! All the travelers are here already. Who else would you like to invite?
DialogueDictionary.SLATE_START_42: Actually, nevermind. Just tell me whenever we ready to start.
DialogueDictionary.SLATE_START_45: So, are you we ready to tell Hornfels and Hal? Are you done with all your other "invites?"
DialogueDictionary.SLATE_START_46: No, not yet. I'll let you know.
DialogueDictionary.SLATE_START_48: Okay, I'll go get Hornfels and Hal.
DialogueDictionary.GOSSAN_START_1: Good luck in space! Feeling nervous about the launch?
DialogueDictionary.GOSSAN_START_2: Kind of. Slate gave me an importaint misson to get all travellers back.
DialogueDictionary.GOSSAN_START_3: Yep. Just wanted to say good bye.
DialogueDictionary.GOSSAN_START_6: We are going to celebrate Christmas. Please don't tell anything to Hal or Hornfels, we wanna surprise them.
DialogueDictionary.GOSSAN_START_7: I wont. Since everyone is gonna be there, can you get down to the cave and call for Tuff? I would be very grateful.
DialogueDictionary.GOSSAN_START_8: Sure, I'll we will be here in few minutes.
DialogueDictionary.GOSSAN_START_9: So, did you had a minute to visit Tuff?
DialogueDictionary.GOSSAN_START_10: Sorry, not yet. On my way.
DialogueDictionary.GOSSAN_START_12: Oh, you are still here? Is everything alright?
DialogueDictionary.GOSSAN_START_13: Yes. Slate gave me an importaint misson to get all travellers back.
DialogueDictionary.GOSSAN_TREE_1: Hey! Tuff is very sorry about that. We almost locked you down in that cave!
DialogueDictionary.GOSSAN_TREE_2: Nah, nevermind. Good that you came back for me.
DialogueDictionary.GOSSAN_TREE_3: For you? Oh, to be honest I came back for my helmet.
DialogueDictionary.TEKTITE_START_1: Heyo, hatchling! Thought you should be in space today - why are you still here?
DialogueDictionary.TEKTITE_START_2: Yes, I also have an importaint mission. Don't you want to join us and celebrate Christmas in the Village?
DialogueDictionary.TEKTITE_START_3: I just wanted to say good bye.
DialogueDictionary.TEKTITE_START_4: Uh, sure, but do you see this thing? I don't like it's roots.
DialogueDictionary.TEKTITE_START_5: It's growing too fast!I need Marl here to cut this thing off first.
DialogueDictionary.TEKTITE_START_6: You know, I can go ask Marl to help here.
DialogueDictionary.TEKTITE_START_7: That would be nice. Thank you.I think we can go celebrate after that.
DialogueDictionary.TEKTITE_START_9: It's still growing, look! Where's Marl?!
DialogueDictionary.TEKTITE_START_10: Hold on, I'll call him as soon as possible.
DialogueDictionary.TEKTITE_START_12: Oh, you are still here? Are you sure everything is alright?
DialogueDictionary.TEKTITE_START_14: Thank you! Marl is here already.
DialogueDictionary.TEKTITE_START_15: I think we got it. We just need to give them few time.
DialogueDictionary.TEKTITE_START_17: Yeah, thank you for help. Look, I found this tiny seed here.
DialogueDictionary.TEKTITE_START_18: Seems like it's not growing at all, maybe it's dead, but I think you should take it as a trophy!
DialogueDictionary.TEKTITE_START_20: I will put it into your ship, looks just like toy!
DialogueDictionary.TEKTITE_START_21: I'll be in the Village then.
DialogueDictionary.TEKTITE_START_22: Finally, we did it! Now we can go celebrate.
DialogueDictionary.TEKTITE_START_25: Thank you for your help in crater. Who knows how fast it would grow.
DialogueDictionary.TEKTITE_START_26: Sure! By the way, I like that toy you gave to me.
DialogueDictionary.TEKTITE_START_27: Sure! By the way, I hate that toy you gave to me.
DialogueDictionary.TEKTITE_START_28: I knew it. It is so cute an tiny! But still, be carefull with it.
DialogueDictionary.TEKTITE_START_30: Wow, why so rude? Give it a chance. Anyway, you can remove it anytime.
DialogueDictionary.RADIO_START_1: Gossan: Hey Tuff! How is it going?
DialogueDictionary.RADIO_START_2: Tuff: Uh, I'm tired. I hate that cave already.
DialogueDictionary.RADIO_START_3: Tuff: What is going on? Why there's snow everywhere?
DialogueDictionary.RADIO_START_5: Gossan: Haven't you seen it? Oh, sure, there's no snow in that cave...
DialogueDictionary.RADIO_START_6: Tuff: Of course. Let's get in the central street and open up a bottle of the Good Stuff?
DialogueDictionary.RADIO_START_15: Hatchling? What are you doing there?!
DialogueDictionary.RADIO_START_16: I think Tuff forgot about me. Can you call the elevator down here?
DialogueDictionary.RADIO_START_17: Sure, I'm calling the elevator now. We will wait you in the center of the Village.
DialogueDictionary.GALENA_START_1: So you are going to get all travellers back?
DialogueDictionary.GALENA_START_2: Yes, they all be here soon.
DialogueDictionary.GALENA_START_3: I'm sorry that I tried to destroy your snowian.
DialogueDictionary.GALENA_START_4: What is that snowian is made of?
DialogueDictionary.GALENA_START_5: It's unbreakable! Tephra found strange rocks inside removed geysers.
DialogueDictionary.GALENA_START_6: We stuck a snowian on top of the rocks and got this effect. It is soooo cool, isn't it?
DialogueDictionary.GALENA_START_8: Good luck with it! We miss them so much.
DialogueDictionary.GALENA_START_10: Mica will never break it, but it is still funny to see their attempts.
DialogueDictionary.MORAINE_START_2: Hey! Not listening to travellers anymore?
DialogueDictionary.MORAINE_START_4: Oh, I remember that I heard Riebeck signal not in usual position during the last signals scanning!
DialogueDictionary.SPINEL_START_1: Fishing song, fishing song<![CDATA[<Pause=1>]]>.<![CDATA[<Pause=1>]]>.<![CDATA[<Pause=1>]]> why it's ice it feels so wrong.
DialogueDictionary.SPINEL_START_3: How is it going?<![CDATA[<Pause=2>]]> Are you kidding me?<![CDATA[<Pause=2>]]> I can't get any fish like that!<![CDATA[<Pause=2>]]>
DialogueDictionary.SPINEL_START_4: Why don't you stay closer to waterfall then?
DialogueDictionary.SPINEL_START_5: Wait, this is actually a good idea! Thank you!
DialogueDictionary.SPINEL_START_6: You're welcome. Do you want to come with us and celebrate Christmas?
DialogueDictionary.SPINEL_START_8: Alright, I'll try to get closer to that waterfall.
DialogueDictionary.SPINEL_START_9: I'd bet everything will be fine with your flight!
DialogueDictionary.TEPHRA_START_1: Hullo! <![CDATA[<Pause=2>]]> Are you going to space today?
DialogueDictionary.TEPHRA_START_3: Galena said that you found strange rocks for snowian.
DialogueDictionary.TEPHRA_START_4: Awww yeah. They were near that strange wires when Marl removed dead geysers.
DialogueDictionary.TEPHRA_START_5: It was my idea to make a snowian with it since Moraine and Arkose are "too busy"
DialogueDictionary.TEPHRA_START_7: They are playing snowballs whole day! You will see them up.
DialogueDictionary.TEPHRA_START_8: Alrigh–µ, I'll take a look. See you later!
DialogueDictionary.TEPHRA_START_9: I wish you the best luck, astronaut!
DialogueDictionary.ARKOSE_START_3: Yeah! This is much better than ghost matter!
DialogueDictionary.RUTILE_START_1: Gotta say I don't remember such snows on Timber Hearth.
DialogueDictionary.RUTILE_START_3: I like that to be honest. By the way, why don't you come see if everything is good with Tektite?
DialogueDictionary.RUTILE_START_4: They went to the crater near the Village. You can find it by big smoke.
DialogueDictionary.RUTILE_START_5: Sure, I'll visit them. Don't miss my launch!
DialogueDictionary.RUTILE_START_6: Sure. I'll be watching for your launch.
DialogueDictionary.RUTILE_START_7: Don't explode your ship!<![CDATA[<Pause=2>]]> Especially with new little scout improvement.
DialogueDictionary.GNEISS_START_1: Another Hearthian is leaving us for outer space! What can I do for you?
DialogueDictionary.GNEISS_START_2: I am going to get all travellers back to home.
DialogueDictionary.GNEISS_START_3: Yep. I just want to say good bye.
DialogueDictionary.GNEISS_START_4: Oh really? That's so nice! So our orchestra will play in full strength!
DialogueDictionary.GNEISS_START_6: Alright, hatchling! Take care of yourself up in space!
DialogueDictionary.GNEISS_START_7: Please, take care of yourself up in space!
DialogueDictionary.TUFF_START_1: Hey there!<![CDATA[<Pause=1>]]> Shouldn't you lift off already?
DialogueDictionary.TUFF_START_2: Yeah. On my way. Actually Gossan asked me to call you up and...
DialogueDictionary.TUFF_START_3: So, what's going on up there?
DialogueDictionary.TUFF_START_4: Gossan asked me to call you up and...
DialogueDictionary.TUFF_TREE_1: I am so sorry about that accident!<![CDATA[<Pause=2>]]> I was too happy that I'm getting out of that cave that I forgot about you.<![CDATA[<Pause=2>]]>.<![CDATA[<Pause=2>]]>.<![CDATA[<Pause=2>]]>
DialogueDictionary.TUFF_TREE_5: It would be a terrible fate to stuck in that cave.
DialogueDictionary.MICA_START_2: I'm excited to see your launch today.
DialogueDictionary.MICA_START_3: Do you want to practice with the model ship before?
DialogueDictionary.MICA_START_5: Hey, did you change your mind and want to try the ship model before?
DialogueDictionary.MICA_START_6: Yes, I have changed my mind.
DialogueDictionary.MICA_START_7: Nice! Look, since my boot's are not good for snow, I can't go down and play with others...
DialogueDictionary.MICA_START_8: Do you see that snowian? Let's destroy it with ship model!
DialogueDictionary.MICA_START_11: I don't think I want to.
DialogueDictionary.MICA_START_12: Meh.. don't worry, just do it and you will see that it's not a regular snowian.
DialogueDictionary.MICA_START_14: Well... at least you have tried!
DialogueDictionary.MICA_START_15: You didn't told me it's undestructable.
DialogueDictionary.MICA_START_17: That's okay. You can come back and give it a try anytime.
DialogueDictionary.MICA_START_19: Ha-ha! Yes, I think Tephra and Galena made something special with it.
DialogueDictionary.MICA_START_20: Take this little snowian a consolation prize for your efforts. I'll put it in the cockpit of your ship.
DialogueDictionary.MICA_START_21: I'll keep my attempts to destroy it anyway.
DialogueDictionary.SLATE_FINAL_2: All the travelers are back, and I can already feel the magical Christmas spirit!
DialogueDictionary.SLATE_FINAL_3: I'm glad all our friends are here.
DialogueDictionary.SLATE_FINAL_5: Sure!<![CDATA[<Pause=2>]]> This probably wouldn't have happened without your help.
DialogueDictionary.SLATE_FINAL_6: You should ask Hornfels, but I'm pretty sure we're almost ready.
DialogueDictionary.SLATE_NOTE_1: Hey, sleepyhead! Find me in the Village when you wake up, we need to talk.<![CDATA[<Pause=2>]]> Slate.
DialogueDictionary.SOLANUM_WALL_TEXT: SOLANUM: This encounter feels VERY special. I am not sure but let us try this: Take the stone that looks like my mask to the place where I am needed. With that done, I will do my best.
DialogueDictionary.SOLANUM_START_2: Hey! Can you read this please? I can drop it for you to get a better view.
DialogueDictionary.CAIRN_1:
<![CDATA[<color=orange>Ash Twin Project</color>]]> experimental interplanetary data transmission. 
(10m)
DialogueDictionary.CHERT_ONE_LOOP_START: Seems you were right after all about the time loop. The sun exploded and I found myself here again at the tree.
DialogueDictionary.CHERT_ONE_LOOP_DONE: You did. What a unique opportunity to study a supernova up close! But why am I only aware of it now? It's quite strange.
DialogueDictionary.ESKER_ONE_LOOP_RESPONSE: Hey Esker, you notice anything out of the ordinary?
DialogueDictionary.ESKER_ONE_LOOP_DONE: No, why? Sorry, I've been too busy talking to the other villagers to pay attention to anything else!
DialogueDictionary.FELDSPAR_ONE_LOOP_START: What was that big flash in the sky earlier? Seems like a call to adventure.
DialogueDictionary.FELDSPAR_ONE_LOOP_RESPONSE: Don't worry about it. We can deal with that after Christmas.
DialogueDictionary.FELDSPAR_ONE_LOOP_DONE: Yes you're right, there will always be more time, right?
DialogueDictionary.RIEBECK_ONE_LOOP_START: DID THE SUN EXPLODE? WHAT WAS THAT!
DialogueDictionary.RIEBECK_ONE_LOOP_RESPONSE: Yes it did, but try not to worry about it, we're safe here.
DialogueDictionary.RIEBECK_ONE_LOOP_DONE: I find that hard to believe! But if the sun exploded and we're still alive then I guess you're right. I think.

UIDictionary.MOD_POPUP: Thanks for installing Christmas Story! This mod contains major spoilers for classic Outer Wilds and DLC! We recommend for you to create a new profile for a better experience.
